a = int(input())
res = 0
while a > 0:
    if (a % 8 == 1):
        res += 1
    a //= 8
print(res)

ans = 0

        ans+=1
    a//=8
print(ans)

n = int(input().strip())
ans = 0
while n != 0:
    if n % 8 == 1:
        ans += 1
    n //= 8
print(ans)
